name: Death's Feather
description:
This game has been created in the visionary spirit of the composer, pianist, and performance artist J. Randolph “Randy” Hostetler (1963-1996). In the maze, you will  explore new artistic ideas, performance art, multimedia performance, improvisation, and avant garde creative endeavors of all kinds.

  • Composed &  Produced By Steve Horowitz : https://www.stevehorowitzmusic.com/
  • Programmed by Scott Looney: http://metaphys-media.com/
  • Designed by Steve Horowitz and Scott Looney co-founders of the Game Audio Institute : https://www.gameaudioinstitute.com/

"There is no route out of the maze. The maze shifts as you move through it, because it is alive." - Phillip K. Dick

C & P 2021 TCI-Games
